#summary Actions are the time-based functionality of KitchenSync sequenced by the Synchronizer.
#labels Actions,Incomplete-MoreDetails

=Actions=
KitchenSync is made up of several types of objects that perform some kind of function and are timed by the Synchronizer. These objects are called _actions_. All actions are subclasses of the abstract class `AbstractAction`. 

==Known descendants of !AbstractAction==
  * [ActionGroups AbstractActionGroup]
  * [KSActionController]
  * [KSParallelGroup]
  * [KSSequenceGroup]
  * [KSStaggeredGroup]
  * [KSDispatchEvent]
  * [KSFunction]
  * [KSMovieClipController]
  * [KSSetProperty]
  * [KSSound]
  * [KSTrace]
  * [KSTween]
  * [KSWait]
